prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek black silhouette and vibrant blue eyes.
Imagine a ghostly creature that blends elegance with an enigmatic aura, featuring flowing hair.
Design a Pokemon that embodies mystery, with sharp features and a soft pastel accent.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with a unique dress-like body shape and striking color contrast.
Generate a character that symbolizes dreams, adorned with star-like elements and a dark palette.
Make a fictional creature with a tall, slender build and an ethereal presence.
Give me a Pokemon that has a blend of elegance and mystery, perfect for a psychic-themed setting.
